name: Anne's Chicken
ingredients: As Needed – Oyster Sauce or Sweet Hoisin Sauce
instructions: Marinade the chicken pieces in soy sauce and chili garlic sauce for at least 2 hours
Cook chicken in oil/butter then set aside
add remaining vegetables to steam cook
When veggies are done, add back the chicken
Add sesame oil and oyster/hoisin sauce
Add cornstarch and water to thicken the sauce

additional_context.source: This is Isaac's Auntie Anne's recipe.
additional_context.tips: Marinading longer makes it more flavorful!
